messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a castle with 15 rooms. Room 1 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 11. Room 2 is connected to room 5, room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 3 is connected to room 6, room 9, room 12, and room 8. Room 4 is connected to room 7, room 10, room 13, and room 15. Room 5 is connected to room 8, room 11, and room 14. Room 6 is connected to room 9, room 12, and room 15. Room 7 is connected to room 10, and room 13. Room 8 is connected to room 14. Room 9 is connected to room 12 and room 15. Room 10 is connected to room 13. Room 11 is connected to room 14. Room 12 is connected to room 15. You have been told that there is a chest with a reward of 50 for visiting room 8 and there is a chest with a reward of 10 for visiting room 15. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask.

We are looking for a Python Developer to join our engineering team and help us develop and maintain various modules on our Linux-based platform. Will consider entry-level candidates with solid educational credentials. You will work side-by-side with the Founder, other team members, and other stakeholders (both partners and our clients' staff) to deliver quality, well thought out microservices that are scalable and reusable on our platform. Python Developer responsibilities include writing and testing code, debugging programs and integrating applications with third-party web services.

We are looking for a Python Developer to join our engineering team and help us develop and maintain various modules on our Linux-based platform. Will consider entry-level educational credentials. You will work side-by-side with the Founder, other team members, and other stakeholders (both partners and our clients' staff) to deliver quality, well thought out microservices that are scalable and reusable on our platform. Python Developer responsibilities include writing and testing code, debugging programs and integrating applications with third-party web services.
Python Developer Responsibilities:
Write "clean," well-designed code
Produce detailed specifications
Troubleshoot, test

You are told that a teleportation portal appears in room 13, through which you can teleport to any room one at a time. This means that from room 13 you can go to any room. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.
